filter.1.name: AdGuard Russian filter
filter.1.description: Filter that enables ad blocking on websites in the Russian language.

filter.2.name: AdGuard Base filter
filter.2.description: EasyList + AdGuard Base filter. This filter is necessary for quality ad blocking.

filter.3.name: AdGuard Tracking Protection filter
filter.3.description: The most comprehensive list of various online counters and web analytics tools. Use this filter, if you do not want your actions on the Internet to be tracked.

filter.4.name: AdGuard Social Media filter
filter.4.description: Filter for social media widgets ("Like" buttons and such).

filter.5.name: AdGuard Experimental filter
filter.5.description: Filter designed to test certain hazardous filtering rules before they are added to the basic filters.

filter.6.name: AdGuard German filter
filter.6.description: EasyList Germany + AdGuard German filter. Filter list that specifically removes ads on websites in the German language.

filter.7.name: AdGuard Japanese filter
filter.7.description: Filter that enables ad blocking on websites in the Japanese language.

filter.8.name: AdGuard Dutch filter
filter.8.description: EasyList Dutch + AdGuard Dutch filter. Filter list that specifically removes ads on websites in the Dutch language.

filter.9.name: AdGuard Spanish/Portuguese filter
filter.9.description: Filter list that specifically removes ads on websites in the Spanish and Portuguese languages.

filter.10.name: Filter unblocking search ads and self-promotion
filter.10.description: Filter that unblocks searches (Duckduckgo, Google, Bing, Yahoo) and self-promo ads. Self-promotion definition: When an ad on a website is promoting this very website or other websites/social media/etc. closely related to it, such an ad is considered a self-promoting one.

filter.11.name: AdGuard Mobile Ads filter
filter.11.description: Filter for all known mobile ad networks. Useful for mobile devices.

filter.12.name: AdGuard Safari filter
filter.12.description: Special filter for Safari 9+ on iOS and macOS. We need a separate filter for Safari browser because it does not fully support our rules syntax.

filter.13.name: AdGuard Turkish filter
filter.13.description: Filter list that specifically removes ads on websites in the Turkish language.

filter.14.name: AdGuard Annoyances filter
filter.14.description: Blocks irritating elements on web pages including cookie notices, third-party widgets and in-page pop-ups.

filter.15.name: AdGuard DNS filter
filter.15.description: Filter composed of several other filters (AdGuard Base filter, Social Media filter, Tracking Protection filter, Mobile Ads filter, EasyList and EasyPrivacy) and simplified specifically to be better compatible with DNS-level ad blocking.

filter.16.name: AdGuard French filter
filter.16.description: Liste FR + AdGuard French filter. Filter list that specifically removes ads on websites in the French language.

filter.17.name: AdGuard URL Tracking filter
filter.17.description: Filter that enhances privacy by removing tracking parameters from URLs.

filter.224.name: AdGuard Chinese filter
filter.224.description: EasyList China + AdGuard Chinese filter. Filter list that specifically removes ads on websites in Chinese language.

filter.101.name: EasyList
filter.101.description: EasyList is the primary subscription that removes adverts from web pages in English. Already included in AdGuard Base filter.

filter.105.name: EasyList Czech and Slovak
filter.105.description: Czech and Slovak supplement for EasyList.

filter.106.name: EasyList Dutch
filter.106.description: Dutch supplement for EasyList. Already included in AdGuard Dutch filter.

filter.107.name: EasyList Germany
filter.107.description: German supplement for EasyList. Already included in AdGuard German filter.

filter.113.name: Liste FR
filter.113.description: French supplement for EasyList. Already included in AdGuard French filter.

filter.120.name: AdBlockID
filter.120.description: Indonesian supplement for EasyList and AdGuard Base filter.

filter.122.name: Fanboy's Annoyances
filter.122.description: Removes in-page pop-ups and other annoyances. Includes Fanboy's Social Blocking & EasyList Cookie Lists.

filter.123.name: Fanboy's Social Blocking List
filter.123.description: Hides and blocks social content, social widgets, social scripts and social icons. Already included in Fanboy's Annoyances list.

filter.201.name: Web Annoyances Ultralist
filter.201.description: Blocks annoying web elements and reclaims lost screen real estate.

filter.202.name: Thai Ads Filters
filter.202.description: Filter that blocks ads on Thai sites.

filter.203.name: Hungarian filter
filter.203.description: Hufilter. Filter list that specifically removes ads on websites in the Hungarian language.

filter.204.name: Peter Lowe's Blocklist
filter.204.description: Filter that blocks ads, trackers, and other nasty things.

filter.207.name: Adblock Warning Removal List
filter.207.description: Removes anti-adblock warnings and other obtrusive messages.

filter.208.name: Online Malicious URL Blocklist
filter.208.description: Blocks domains that are known to be used to propagate malware and spyware.

filter.210.name: Spam404
filter.210.description: This filter protects you from online scams.

filter.212.name: RU AdList: Counters
filter.212.description: RU AdList supplement for trackers blocking.

filter.213.name: RU AdList: BitBlock
filter.213.description: RU AdList supplement for annoyances and socials.

filter.215.name: Fanboy's Enhanced Tracking List
filter.215.description: Blocks common tracking scripts such as Omniture, Webtrends, Foresee, Coremetrics, Google Analytics, Touch Clarity and Channel Intelligence.

filter.216.name: Official Polish filters for AdBlock, uBlock Origin & AdGuard

filter.217.name: Polish GDPR-Cookies Filters
filter.217.description: Polish filter list for cookies blocking.

filter.218.name: Estonian List
filter.218.description: Filter for ad blocking on Estonian sites.

filter.219.name: ChinaList+EasyList
filter.219.description: Adblocking list for China. Note that it does not actually include EasyList.

filter.220.name: CJX's Annoyances List
filter.220.description: Supplement for EasyList China+EasyList and EasyPrivacy.

filter.221.name: Polish Social Filters
filter.221.description: Polish filter list for social widgets, popups, etc.

filter.223.name: Fanboy's Swedish
filter.223.description: Filter list for websites in Swedish.

filter.225.name: Fanboy's Anti-Facebook List
filter.225.description: Warning, it will break Facebook-based comments on some websites and may also break some Facebook apps or games.

filter.226.name: Fanboy's Vietnamese
filter.226.description: Filter list for websites in Vietnamese.

filter.227.name: List-KR
filter.227.description: Filter that removes ads, trackers, and various scripts from websites with Korean content. Based on Corset, Korean Adblock filter, Youslist. Combined and augmented with AdGuard-specific rules for enhanced filtering. This filter is expected to be used alongside with AdGuard Base filter.

filter.228.name: xinggsf
filter.228.description: Blocks ads on the Chinese video platforms (MangoTV, DouYu and others).

filter.229.name: I don't care about cookies
filter.229.description: Hides annoying cookie warnings from almost all websites and saves you from unnecessary clicks.

filter.230.name: Fanboy's Spanish/Portuguese
filter.230.description: Filter list for websites in Spanish and Portuguese.

filter.232.name: KAD - Anti-Scam
filter.232.description: Filter that protects against various types of scams, such as mass text messaging, fake online stores, etc.

filter.234.name: ROLIST2
filter.234.description: This is a complementary list for ROList with annoyances that are not necessarily banners. It is a very aggressive list and not recommended for beginners.

filter.235.name: Iranian filter
filter.235.description: Ad blocking rules for Iranian/Persian websites.

filter.237.name: Polish Annoyances Filters
filter.237.description: Filter list that hides and blocks pop-ups, widgets, newsletters, push notifications, arrows, tagged internal links that are off-topic, and other irritating elements. Polish GDPR-Cookies Filters is already in it.

filter.238.name: Polish Anti Adblock Filters
filter.238.description: Official Polish filters against Adblock alerts.

filter.239.name: Fanboy's Anti-thirdparty Fonts
filter.239.description: A filter that blocks third-party fonts. It may break the look and design of some websites.

filter.240.name: BarbBlock
filter.240.description: BarbBlock is a content blocking list with standalone browser extensions for Chrome and Firefox. It blacklists sites that have used DMCA takedowns to force removal from other content blocking lists. Such takedowns are categorically invalid, but they can be effective at intimidating small open-source projects into compliance.

filter.241.name: EasyList Cookie List
filter.241.description: Removes cookie and privacy warnings. Already included in Fanboy's Annoyances list.

filter.242.name: NoCoin Filter List
filter.242.description: This filter disables browser-based miners such as coin-hive.

filter.243.name: Frellwit's Swedish Filter
filter.243.description: A filter for uBlock Origin that aims to remove regional Swedish ads, tracking, social media, annoyances, sponsored articles etc.

filter.244.name: YousList
filter.244.description: Filter that blocks ads on Korean sites.

filter.245.name: AlleBlock
filter.245.description: Filter that removes annoying elements from Polish e-commerce sites.

filter.247.name: Polish Anti-Annoying Special Supplement
filter.247.description: Filters that block and hide RSS elements and remnants of hidden newsletters combined with social elements on Polish websites.

filter.249.name: Dandelion Sprout's Nordic Filters
filter.249.description: This list covers websites for Norway, Denmark, Iceland, Danish territories, and the Sami indigenous population.
